name: StatusOption

properties.name: class
properties.description: CSS class(es) used to e.g. accent the status (contextual color, etc.)
properties.rawdescription: CSS class(es) used to e.g. accent the status (contextual color, etc.)

properties.name: icon
properties.description: An icon to use to display the status.
properties.rawdescription: An icon to use to display the status.

properties.name: key
properties.description: Key used for this status in the c8y_Service object.
properties.rawdescription: Key used for this status in the c8y_Service object.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Human readable name of the status used to be translated.
properties.rawdescription: Human readable name of the status used to be translated.

description: Defines the visual presentation of a service status option.
rawdescription: Defines the visual presentation of a service status option.
